text: Allah bai sanya zuciya biyu ba ga wani namiji a cikinsa, kuma bai sanya matanku waɗanda kuke yin zihari daga gare su, su zama uwayenku ba, kuma bai sanya ɗiyan hankakarku su zama ɗiyanku ba. wannan abu naku, maganarku ce da bakunanku alhali kuwa Allah na faɗar gaskiya, kuma Shi ne ke shiryarwa ga hanyar ƙwarai
